actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States ex rel. Rudd, et al. v. General Contractors, Inc., et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in the case of United States ex rel. Rudd, et al. v. General Contractors, Inc., et al. to defend the constitutionality of the qui tam provisions of the False Claims Act.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States ex rel. Rudd, et al. v. General Contractors, Inc., et al.
